strings.Value: "You came HERE to hide from the violence?"
"I don't care what you were doing here. Get back to the capital — they need your help."
{n}Bartholomew squeamishly brushes himself off, then performs a hasty bow.{/n} "Your Highness! Right on time, as always. Thank you for once again coming to my rescue!"

"Your Highness, as your loyal subject, I took every possible measure to protect your kingdom's most valuable asset — myself! My knowledge is far too important to just let it vanish upon my death. So I made the executive decision to leave the walls of the capital and come here to hide from all the violence in the city!"

{n}Bartholomew swallows a few times, then sighs.{/n} "Forgive me, Your Highness. I lied. When all... this... started, I took it for a chance to gain new materials for my research. Taking advantage of the confusion, I returned to where I captured my first troll..."
"...and was captured by these beasts as a result! They seriously thought about cutting my face off to examine my head from the inside! Can you imagine? Cruel, brainless savages!"
"Well, thank you again for your timely appearance and saving my life! I'll return to the capital immediately — even a city swarming with monsters must be safer than THESE dungeons."
"Oh... Oh! So that's how it is, now, Your Highness? After all my loyal service? Well, then, as you wish — I'll go. Farewell!"
